013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
016
017/**
018 * Defines an API for converting conventional bean property names to some other form.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * For example, given the bean property <js>"fooBarURL"</js>, the {@link PropertyNamerDLC} property namer will convert
022 * this to <js>"foo-bar-url"</js>.
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * Property namers are associated with beans through the {@link Bean#propertyNamer @Bean(propertyNamer)} annotation.
026 *
027 * <ul class='seealso'>
028
029 * </ul>
030 */
031public interface PropertyNamer {
032
033   /**
034    * Represents a non-existent class.
035    */
036   public interface Void extends PropertyNamer {}
037
038   /**
039    * Convert the specified default property name to some other value.
040    *
041    * @param name The original bean property name.
042    * @return The converted property name.
043    */
044   public String getPropertyName(String name);
045}
